ruleset.name: Apex Structure Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code structure and organization

rule.name: EnumMinimumValues
rule.message: Enum must contain at least {0} values. Enums with fewer than {0} values may indicate a design issue
rule.description: Enums must contain at least a minimum number of values (configurable via minValues property). Enums with fewer than the minimum number of values should be reconsidered as they may not provide sufficient flexibility or may indicate a design issue. For boolean-like scenarios, consider using a boolean instead of an enum with only two values.

property.name: minValues
property.description: Minimum number of enum values required
